item.title: What I've tried so far, or 'ffs, just pick one course!'
item.description: When I decided to learn to code I had no idea how many top quality resources were available – and for free, as well. I wanted to do them all – I thought I could do them all. Even once I’d committed, I was still researching and finding others to do ‘next’. Because smashing through a course about learning to think like a programmer and learning an actual new language would be a breeze, wouldn’t it?
